posts.content:
Sneaking, Trapping and Assassinating Enemies PvP and PvM (1-40)

NIGHT TALON--Ranger 10, Assassin 29, SD 1
By Tyr Templar
Author’s Note: This build, the Night Talon, originally published in the ECB on July 28, 2007, has been revisited in light of the 1.69 patch. To see the original character, with links therein to other combos at the time of original posting, see: http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 79699.html
Concept: The PC default biography on Halflings reads, "You may be short, but you're quick and full of spirit. You've recently wandered into human settlements, eager to see what you can learn from the tall-folk." But this isn’t your true story; while you did enter a human settlement, it was in truth for the purpose of exacting revenge against the humans responsible for killing a member of your family, a beloved merchant held up and killed by some highway robbers whilst en route to town, which robbers you tracked down and subsequently killed, but you were caught. Impressed with your skills, however, Faerun’s powers-that-be gave you a choice: a death sentence for murder in cold-blood, or life as an assassin. You chose the latter.

Night Talon--Ranger(10), Assassin(29), Shadowdancer(1)

I Attributes:
STR: 10
DEX: 18 (36)
CON: 14
WIS: 12
INT: 14
CHA: 8

Race: Halfling / Alignment: Any Evil (Theme: NE)

II Level Guide:
01: Ranger(1): weapon finesse, favored enemy I, {Dual Wield}
02: Ranger(2)
03: Ranger(3): weapon focus: dagger
04: Ranger(4): DEX+1, (DEX=19)
05: Ranger(5): favored enemy II
06: Ranger(6): dodge
07: Ranger(7)
08: Ranger(8): DEX+1, (DEX=20)
09: Ranger(9): mobility, {Improved Two-Weapon Fighting}
10: Assassin(1)
11: Shadowdancer(1): {Hide in Plain Sight}
12: Assassin(2): DEX+1, blind fight, {Uncanny Dodge I}, (DEX=21)
13: Assassin(3)
14: Assassin(4)
15: Assassin(5): knockdown
16: Assassin(6): DEX+1, (DEX=22)
17: Assassin(7)
18: Assassin(8): toughness
19: Assassin(9)
20: Assassin(10): DEX+1, (DEX=23)
21: Assassin(11): epic fortitude (PvP) -OR: your choice: IKD or Impr.Crit: dagger (PvM/E)
22: Assassin(12)
23: Assassin(13)
24: Assassin(14): DEX+1, epic weapon focus: dagger, great dexterity I, (DEX=25)
25: Assassin(15)
26: Assassin(16)
27: Assassin(17): epic skill focus: move silently (PvP), or, armor skin (PvM/E)*
28: Assassin(18): DEX+1, great dexterity II, (DEX=27)
29: Assassin(19)
30: Assassin(20): great dexterity III, (DEX=28)
31: Assassin(21)
32: Assassin(22): DEX+1, great dexterity IV, (DEX=30)
33: Assassin(23): great dexterity V, (DEX=31)
34: Assassin(24)
35: Assassin(25)
36: Assassin(26): DEX+1, great dexterity VI, great dexterity VII, (DEX=34)
37: Assassin(27)
38: Assassin(28)
39: Ranger(10): great dexterity VIII, epic prowess, (DEX=35)
40: Assassin(29): DEX+1, (DEX=36)

*Feat Note: if prefer ESF: Disc over ESF: M/S (PvP), then bump a Grt.Dex to where ESF: M/S currently is, grabbing ESFisc. where that last Grt.Dex was/is at lev 39 on taking your last level of ranger. For PvM/E, feel free to grab two of: IKD, IC: dagger and/or armor skin as per the guide instead, or otherwise as you prefer.

-----

III Basics:

a) Hitpoints: 402

b)Saving Throws (Fortitude/Will/Reflex): 26/18/36 (38 Cat’s)
Saving Throw bonuses: Traps: +2, Poison: +6, Fear: +2

Other: HiPs (High Stealth); UMD.

IV Combat Vitals:

i) Death Attack (DC): 41 (Bio-Cap: 47, +1 UMD/Prayer: 48)

ii) AB and Damage:
BAB: 26, AB (naked): 44 (melee), 42 (ranged)

-Mundane Dagger(s):
AB 44, +2 Cat’s: 46 (-2 dual-wield); Damage: 1d4+3 FE* (19-20/x2), 15d6 sneak
Round Total (6 apr): 6-24 (24-42 FEs) (crit: 19-20/x2), 90d6 Sneak

-Gear [Assuming +6 DEX/STR, +5 keen Ice Talons (1d6 Cold enhancement), UMD/Haste]:
Single Wield (AB): 54/49/44/39/54 * Dual Wield (AB): 52/47/42/37/54/52/47

*Damage--Main Hand: 1-4+8, +3 FEs, +1d6 Cold (17-20/x2), 15d6 sneak
Round Total: 45-60, +5-30 Cold, Or: 50-90 (65-105 FEs) (crit: 17-20/x2), 90d5 sneak

*Damage--Off-Hand: 1-4+6, +3 FEs, +1d6 Cold (17-20/x2), 15d6 sneak
Round Totals (2 apr): 14-10, +2-12 Cold, Or: 16-22 (22-28 FEs) (crit: 17-20/x2), 90d2 sneak

*FEs Note: for your 2 FEs, might I recommend dwarves and humans (PvP) (otherwise, undead and constructs, or as you prefer).

Other: HiPs; Assassin Darkness (with Ranger Ultravision); Epic Traps.

iii) Trap Damage:
* Acid Blob single creature 18d6 acid (and chance of paralysis, 5 rounds)
* Electrical, 7 creatures/15 ft, 30d6 electric (60d6 epic)
* Fire, All/10 ft. radius, 25d6 fire (50d6 epic)
* Frost, single creature, 8d4 cold (40d4 epic) (& chance of paralysis, 4 rounds)
* Holy, single creature, 8d4 (12d10 if undead) divine damage
* Negative, single creature, 9d6 negative (and chance of -1 level drain)
* Sonic, All/10 Ft., 8d4 sonic (40d4 epic) (and chance of stun, 4 rounds)
* Spike, single creature, 25d6 piercing
* Tangle, All/10 Ft., chance of slowing, 5 rounds
* Gas traps inflict poison to all creatures within a 15 foot radius.

For more information, see: http://www.nwnwiki.org/Trap
V Defense Vitals (AC):
AC (naked): 32, +2 Cat’s: 34 (with mundane shield: 36 AC).

Other: HiPs; Assassin Impr.Invisibility (SC-5); Death Attack

VI Spell Casting: Ranger(2), UMD.

VII Skillpoints: 260*
Disable Trap 1(5), Discipline 40(40), Hide 43(56, +4 Small Stature: 60)*, Listen 40(43, +4 Small Stature: 47, +3 FEs: 50)*, Move Silently 43(68, +4 Small Stature: 72), Set Trap 32(45)[add +20 “Take 20” when not in Combat: 65 i.e. EPIC TRAPS!], Tumble 40(53), UMD 21(20)

Stealth Note:
Hide: 60, +4 Trackless Step: 64 / Ranger Buffs, +2 Cat’s, +10 Camou: 76 (-4 Indoors)
Move Silently: 72, +4 Trackless: 76 / Ranger Buffs, +2 Cat’s: 78 (-4 indoors)

*Players should feel free to adjust their Night Talon to suit their own needs/preferences, as always.

EDIT: added alternative feat-selection (PvM/E).

posts.author: campgod
posts.content: I like this build and want to try it out on my server. Couple of questions for you. On my server Assassin's get HiPs at lvl 9 so I can get rid of the SD lvl. So should I just go Assassin 30? Also, on my server Assassin's can take the feat Imp Sneak attack without having any Rogue lvls, would you add any of those in there or just keep the feats the same? Thanks for your time.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Wow, Assassins with HiPS is kind of sick LOL.

Well, not only do you get to pick another class, you also don't need Dodge or Mobility, which are SD requirements. If you won't need that level, I suggest a bit of an altered spread. I'd go for Ranger 10 Assassin 26 Fighter 4 and get WS / EWS and you still have 2 more Fighter bonus feats to use as you please. IKD, Improved Critical or rearrange the epic feats to try to use these Fighter ones to get EWF and EP so you can fit in 2 more Great Dexterities. (all Fighter levels in Epics)

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
29 levels of assassin and high DA DC - I like it!
AB like a fighter - I like that too!
HIPS - great for setting up paralyzing death attacks!
Ranger 10 in epic levels for an epic bonus feat - nice!
Halfling, a superb race for assassin -

I'd start taking assassin levels from level 6 and pick SD at level 8 - IMO DA and HIPS are stronger than the pet and ITWF at the early levels.
I'd probably pick a scouting skill over discipline too.
But I still like your build

posts.author: campgod
posts.content: Thanks for the ideas, you don't need to do re-work the whole build but what would the spread be with your idea of the fighter?

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
As I said Ranger 10 Fighter 4 Assassin 26, all fighter levels post-epic. Use the 3 bonus feats to get EWF, Epic Prowess and EWS (the last level needs to be taken on a general feat level to give access to EWS as you'll need a general feat to take WS and then the bonus feat to take EWS all on the same level, cuz you only have 4 levels to spare).

pre-epic Ranger 10 Assassin 10

Take it EZ!
